name: action-command
description: A command to write a value to a property, with options for priority, delay, and error handling.

fields.name: device-identifier
fields.description: The optional device identifier (if different from the local device).

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier containing the property to write.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The property identifier to write to.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: Optional array index if the property is an array.

fields.name: property-value
fields.description: The value to write to the property.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Optional priority level for the write operation (1-16).

fields.name: post-delay
fields.description: Optional delay in seconds after executing this command before the next.

fields.name: quit-on-failure
fields.description: Indicates whether to stop executing subsequent commands if this one fails.

fields.name: write-successful
fields.description: Indicates whether the write operation was successful.
